about_the_game: Sifera is a massive open world Sci-fi FPS where you, the player, take on the role of a "Raider" to jump into this new adventure. Explore, shoot, and build your way to greatness. Players can not only engage in the challenging first person gameplay, but can also explore the vast wilderness, meeting strange alien beings and hunting the monstrous creatures that roam there. You will see sprawling landscapes and discover lost civilizations and species. Your job is simple, venture out into the cold unknown and conquer it with all the tools you will have at your disposal. In Sifera you can enjoy playing with up to 8 of your friends, high octane first person combat, a deep narrative campaign as well an in depth building system that allows you to create massive bases.

content_descriptors.notes: contains scenes of extreme violence and adult situations including shooting, death, gore

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit.
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (Version 20H2)
  • Processor: Six-Core Xeon E5-2643 @ 3.4GHz.
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 SUPER.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 125 GB available space

short_description: Embark on an adventure in Sifera, a world scarred by 'The Cascade.' Explore vast landscapes, uncover secrets, and engage in challenging combat. Your choices shape the fate of the planet in this epic journey.
